extendedInfo.description: Longshot HD features 3 game modes: Battle, Bird Hunting and Target Practice.****** Battle Mode *******In battle mode, challenge your friends or the computer to an epic one on one battle to the death. Players will take turns launching arrows across the battlefield. The last one standing is the victor.****** Bird Hunting *******In bird hunting, show off your skills in hitting as many birds as you can in three minutes. Or hone your skills in free play mode.****** Target Practice *******Target practice features two modes. In stationary target, master angle to distance calculations. This is great practice for battles. In clay shooting, test your speed against the flying clay targets. This is great practice for bird hunting.bowman battle bow and arrow shooting stick man stickman archery 2-player multiplayer arcade game target practice bird hunting clay

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: If you like archery or any games involving bow and arrow you will like this. It\'s pretty simple and the different game modes keeps it challenging, well worth the buck. Only thing keeping me from giving 5 stars is that there is no sound effects.
reviews.author: Igor Pradel

reviews.title: All fun but
reviews.comment: when u shoot 2 birds with one arrow the game crashes
reviews.author: Jaroslaw J. Kowalski

reviews.title: Good game
reviews.comment: Good game but needs hp gauge on 2 player mode and then it will be 5 stars. And a head shot should kill
reviews.author: Matt H

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Incase anyone is wondering, there are no ads. I was worried myself lol...

reviews.title: Nice game
reviews.comment: Pretty good game play, it does get repetitive though. Story mode with some tougher opponents would be nice.
reviews.author: Bryn Pound

reviews.title: No sound!
reviews.comment: I love the game play,but there are no sound at all. i buy this game. so if there is a sound effect it will be better and i will give you 5 star rating.
reviews.author: Hazim Azhar

reviews.title: Cool game
reviews.comment: It glitches on bird hunting mode after I missed going up...then it came back down and killed 2 at the same time. Said fatal.error lol and shut down.
reviews.author: Dave Lindberg

reviews.title: Excellent!
reviews.comment: The best and most complete bow shooter I\'ve played yet!

reviews.title: Great

reviews.comment: Great game but more modes are needed for Battles :)
